mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna(qnano, memberno, categoryno, title, quest, rdate) VALUES (qna_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{categoryno}, #{title}, #{quest}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT qnano, memberno, categoryno, title, quest, rdate FROM qna ORDER BY qnano DESC
SELECT qnano, memberno, categoryno, title, quest, rdate, FROM qna WHERE qnano = #{qnano}

SELECT qnano, memberno, categoryno, title, quest, rdate, FROM qna
WHERE categoryno=#{categoryno}
WHERE categoryno=#{categoryno} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(quest) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY qnano DESC
